channel.title: Rezin the Complete Seriess
channel.description: Rezin (pronounced "Ree-zin") is a Christian action/adventure series focusing on a character named, "Rezin" who is caught in the middle of a global conspiracy where he fights against the evil Dominion empire who are in the throws of unleashing untold evil upon the earth. [ktfproductions.com]

item.title: Episode 1 Part 1 - "The Beginning"
item.description: Rezin (pronounced Ree-zin) is a Christian action/adventure series that follows the life of the title character who finds himself caught in the middle of a global conspiracy where he fights against the evil Dominion Empire who are in the throws of unleashing untold evil upon the earth. First watch, then listen to over 7 hours of action and intrigue by following the complete series from beginning to end.
